lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise. Business creates jobs, jobs free people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others sell their goods or services.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: l like the idea the 100% of the ammount goes to people who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: l am the co-owner of an carpenter / constructionfirm with 35 employees

lenders.name: Hanny
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: zoo animal registration, transport, studbooks

lenders.name: Patricia & Maarten
lenders.loan_because: KIVA´s micro-credit service is a great iniative that allows individuals such as us to support small enterprises across the world with small loans. We have previously loaned to a food production/sales store in Nigeria,  a clothing store in Ghana, a cattle farm and a wine farm in Azerbaijan, to name a few. All businesses repaid their loans within a year with small monthly payments. With only a few hundred dollars we have already loaned to more than 25 individuals and groups across the world.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to connect in a direct and personal way with people in other parts of the world and to help them fulfill their entrepreneurial dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the legal department in an acute care hospital system called Lahey Clinic. It is based just outside of Boston, Massachusetts, USA. There are real estate, employment, regulatory, contractual and other issues at Lahey Clinic that require the help of lawyers. The members of the legal department provide that help.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to support themself and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I research medicine for cancer.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisations to perform better, mostly in the public sector.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do, and you can help people in need.  Also many people are less fourtunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Walnut Hills High School.  The subjects I take range from Band to Latin.

lenders.name: Toine+Annemarie
lenders.loan_because: Be true to yourself and you ll never fall.............
lenders.occupational_info: Lawyer

lenders.name: Scott Asch
lenders.loan_because: Power to the People!
lenders.occupational_info: Id rather be windsurfing.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a farm
lenders.occupational_info: I am a twice retired farmer engineering  and then from farming in Virgina

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: God has taken care of us and we want to take care of others because of His love...

lenders.name: Carol Cisecki
lenders.loan_because: Today is my first step to helping my neighbours around the world.

lenders.name: Avoco AS
lenders.loan_because: We understand the need of financing when starting up a business. This is a brilliant way to assist other people in arhchieving their plans for a better future for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Founders of computer programming company.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
We all go to heaven on the wings of those  we've helped.
-Kerouac

lenders.name: Stefano
lenders.loan_because: I think that helping others to grow is a fair use of our small and great wealth
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a network builder in Italy and all over the world together with my wife

lenders.name: Dave Higgs-Vis
lenders.loan_because: I was born into privilege. I don't believe I'm special because of it. Rather, I think we have all been born into abundance. I have the opportunity to share what I have been given, and I give thanks that I can. Jah Bless!
lenders.occupational_info: I make food. I like to make simple food. I believe that the ingredients should be the focus. These ingredients should be fresh and local.

lenders.name: sara
lenders.loan_because: it feels right to me
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency committed to ending violence. Our work helps those who have been abused and provides education on violence prevention .

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It\\\'s great to be able to help ordinary people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently training to be a minister (priest) in the Church of England.

lenders.name: Julie Seidell
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to be able to help people who are working to make their own lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: self employed jewelry designer.

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: It’s great to know where your money goes - and to get feedback on the success. Also, I believe that loans increases the feeling of responsibility in the loan taker. Hence, it is a better aid than just giving the money away.

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I was once helped by someone who owed me nothing and I wish to pass along the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about motorcycles and travel. I help people prepare their motorcycles for journeys around my country and around the world.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for The Nature Conservancy.

lenders.name: Philip & Jenisel
lenders.loan_because: We all need help to realize our dreams.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.occupational_info: I work with dental patients that suffer from disease of the gums to help them learn how important it is to properly take care of the surrounding tissues of the their teeth.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in people's lives

lenders.name: Corrie
lenders.loan_because: I feel that one of the best ways to support economic equality and responsible commerce is to support small and family-owned businesses-- at home as well as abroad. If that support can also help a family improve its economic situation or quality of life, all the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an educator for kids, teaching them about animals and the environment.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It sounds like a cool thing to do in the why not category. It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English Second Language and run a comedy website

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I am aware that what little I have to share can be a great amount for someone else. I am lucky my country is stable and has a strong currency. I know I am fortunate to be able to work to take care of myself and I appreciate the entrepreneurial desires of the kiva community of borrowers.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive to my client\'s home and set up my massage bed/table. I place sheets and a blanket on it. I turn on relaxing music and leave the room to wash my hands while the client climbs onto the table. I return and, using sesame oil, I massage their head, arms, hands, legs, feet, back, and hips, one part at a time. I leave the room to wash again while the client gets up and puts on a robe. Then the client pays me & I take my table and drive to the next client.

lenders.name: Brent & Heather
lenders.loan_because: ...of a Frontline World piece we saw on Kiva.  Govermental (top-down) influence is clearly not enough to create positive change in the developing world.  Person-to-person (bottom-up) assistance in any form is needed, and Kiva is a great example.
lenders.occupational_info: Heather is in the process of starting her own business - an exercise studio - so she is living first-hand the difficulties involved.  Brent has worked for various internet companies for over 10 years, and he sees Kiva as a wonderful application of internet technology.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help people that know what they want to do, but just do not yet have the resources to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the Information Technology Infrastructure in a major hotel in Chicago.

lenders.name: quinn
lenders.loan_because: We are all one human family, only love can nurture our family.
lenders.occupational_info: Music is my passion and I help to write,play, and produce music with a message of love. I want to improve my community,myself and the world,

lenders.name: anders
lenders.loan_because: I want to support poor people, I have so much and they have so little. This seems to be te best way to give your support without involving The World Bank, croked politicians and government officials.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a hard physical work, building houses and carrying building materials to the workers, cleaning up, and make sure people around me are i a good mood.

lenders.name: Sailesh
lenders.loan_because: I am a believer in MicroFinance as way of helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead Payments Systems design and strategy for a major UK bank

lenders.name: Jan en Hilde Breed Vos
lenders.loan_because: We should support people who take their responsibility and try to make steps forward!
lenders.occupational_info: Jan: manager at the Free University, Amsterdam. Hilde: was secretary municipal welfare. Unfortunately Hilde died in 2007. But her name will live on in this KIVA-account!

lenders.name: Gielis
lenders.loan_because: (if succesfull) it leads to a sustainable future

lenders.name: Fabienne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Gezinus
lenders.loan_because: I\'m interested in people worldwide, especially what drives them to get a better life. Healtcare is always dependent on good economic circumstances and that is why I want to help small businesses in developing countrys
lenders.occupational_info: I am a docter in a healthcarecenter in the Netherlands

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help get books, movies, and audio books to people in Massachusetts.

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.loan_because: it's a pleasure to support woman all over the world.

lenders.name: Ellen & Willem
lenders.loan_because: we want a better world and people to people contact.

lenders.name: Mart & Annemarie
lenders.loan_because: We lend because we want to make a little difference to people who need and deserve it. We have had all the opportunities we could wish for, so now it is time to help create opportunities for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Mart is a selfemployed trainer/coach, Annemarie is the receptionist at the Dutch Opera.

lenders.name: Boaz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in donating directly to the people by making microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: Business devlopment in a biotechnology company.

lenders.name: Heleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving and taking a helping hand and because this is a great way of making the world a smaller place with bigger opportunities for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing information rich applications that offer a good user experience, for example making a website that everybody can easily access and use.

lenders.name: Nini and Ton
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people in the Third World by giving them a chance to earn their money. So they can live and can let study their children. Besides you can see how they use their loan.

lenders.name: Claudio
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying engineering, that's all.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I want to share and help
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent ICT-manager.

lenders.name: Matthijs
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to change their lives
lenders.occupational_info: Giving visually impaired people in developing countries access to information

lenders.name: Carole Tessier
lenders.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world" —Gandhi

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the chance to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Marjolijn en Ronald
lenders.loan_because: We know how difficult it can be to get a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: We do  a lot of thinking (and designing) for various enterprises. Like a new businessname, striking advertisements or a particular logo.

lenders.name: Carina
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to build a life for themselves

lenders.name: Gerrit
lenders.loan_because: In the Netherlands Princess Maxima did a good job in promoting microcredit loans
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small software office developping administrative tools in education

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I read the book \"The End of Global Poverty\" and was inspired to do more to help poverty in Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Sierra Club which works in the U.S. to protect clean air, clean water, and wild spaces.

lenders.name: Els
lenders.loan_because: I want to help somebody to fulfill her/his dream because if you can live your dream, you'll be happy!
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own practice for soul retrieval and healing.

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help other people to realize their ideas and wishes.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Dutch as a second language, so I met people from different countries.

lenders.name: Kees
lenders.loan_because: Helping doesn\'t get any easier than this! The internet at it\'s best, bringing people together.

lenders.name: Sandra en Patrick
lenders.loan_because: This site just won my heart when I first read about it in a paper. I like the idea of actually  seeing the people that set up their businesses with a little help from us and a lot of courage and determination from themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Officework

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.  Everyone should be entitled to follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide advice, guidance, and structure to businesses.

lenders.name: Wei
lenders.loan_because: i believe it will make difference to those who work hard.
lenders.occupational_info: i\'m from China, now studying in U.S.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I design and write software that allows people to do things more quickly on the computer than by hand.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I think this a great way to help people. And I like that you can chose who to lend to and to which kind of businesses the money goes to. I think in that way you can have a relatively big effect on an individual, local level
lenders.occupational_info: I am working with local authorities and stakeholders to improve the rural economy in Groningen (Netherlands), realizing all kinds of projects on agriculture, tourism, landscape and watermanagement. Key to success is cooperation and doing that bottum-up, with individuals (\'fire souls\') living in villages and towns. And that\'s what I like about Kiva too, because the enterpreneurs are \'fire souls\' too who can make a difference.

lenders.name: UNBB
lenders.occupation: Group of Finnish uni mates (School of Economics)
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can. Microloan is one of the most effective ways to help people help themselves.  It is also truly exiciting and interesting to see how  people’s standards of living develop.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of people (Group of Finnish uni mates, Helsinki School of Economics) wanting to do something to help people who live in poverty. We work in several fields in Finland (and also in Barbados and UK): banking, IT, finance, journalism, public relations, communications, EU, foreign ministry.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, so I want bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design stuff.

lenders.name: Frida, Harrie and Ruben
lenders.loan_because: Because we feel an obligation to help empower people. Kiva is just the right organisation for us.  We are connected with real projects and with the development of the entrepeneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: We Harrie and Frida work in ICT and Finance. Ruben is our son he goes to school and Play's Baseball and Soccer.

lenders.name: Vaughn
lenders.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked."
lenders.occupational_info: I do research and teach mathematics.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: The world might last a little longer if we just help each other out. KIVA is an easy way to lend a hand and make the world a better place. I don't care who you are or where you live, we're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fireman and an emergency medic. I have been one a very long time and now I teach younger people how to do this work. Finding another way to help is really exciting.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be able to and others were not as lucky but just as (if not more) hard working as I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Canadian teacher, trying to make it in Auckland.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.occupation: Student / National Bank of Denmark / teacher
lenders.loan_because: I believe this system is one of the best in erasing poverty in the long run from the worldmap.
lenders.occupational_info: I study math and economics, Is placed in a project-evaluating group in a NGO wich mainly operates in India and work work every 2. weekend with children with special needs.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: It really feels like your helping those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Air Traffic Controller

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to see a greener future for developing countries and I think Kiva is an awesome way to connect people!
lenders.occupational_info: Clean Energy Development in Latin America

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.occupation: Dean at an University of Applied Science
lenders.loan_because: Labour and education...two essential needs to make life better. I want to make my contribution to that. Here, in Holland, and -however small- to people in other parts of the world

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I strongly support people that take the risc and grab the opportunity to start a business.
lenders.occupational_info: Its my job to implement and maintain efficient business processes for a large Dutch media buying agency.

lenders.name: Marius
lenders.occupation: retired vice president university of Groningen
lenders.loan_because: it feels good, women are the best to invest in
lenders.occupational_info: together with my retired partner we started an investment fund for modern art

lenders.name: Rona
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a place of opportunity. Therefore, I believe it is my responsibility to share and help others. I also want to make this world a better place for my granchildren.

lenders.name: Businessbox
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs must to support othter entrepreneurs whenever they can!
lenders.occupational_info: marketing/communication consultancy

lenders.name: Arcola KoreanAmericans
lenders.loan_because: This is a great idea.  How could we NOT do this?

lenders.name: Robert Jan
lenders.loan_because: it can change lifes. And it makes me feel connected to people who started their lifes with less chances than me. A small help for a better world.

lenders.name: Tyrie
lenders.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift, and I love to loan because I can\'t tell if I am helping someone survive or helping someone realize a dream, but I know we all need both, so it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an art museum where a lot of big shows, dinners, and parties are held. I plan the invitations and promotions for these events.

lenders.name: Jon Pfleiderer
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to help people around the world.

lenders.name: YPO Chicago Teens
lenders.loan_because: we care
lenders.occupational_info: we\'re students, we don\'t really work

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I am a disabled veteran of decidedly modest means and was delighted to find a way to make small loans to entrepreneurs, particularly women involved in food production/distribution. I'm not Bill Gates, but I still can help people.
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I have heard of Kiva thru a friend and it seems like a great way to help people get business up and running.
lenders.occupational_info: I am as sales rep. for a major decorative fabric company. I worked for this company for 41 years.  We sell decorative fabrics to interior designers and window covering companies and we also manufacture window coverings and bedspreads.

lenders.name: Patti & Joel
lenders.loan_because: we believe this is a great way to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Joel worked for the railroad.  He was a brakeman and a conductor.     Patti worked lots of jobs over the years and now stays at home happily.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: everyone should be able to earn an honest living with grace and dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 18 children ranging in age from 6 -11, at a small, rural school. I have been teaching for 21 years and have taught/lived in the USA and Africa.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: That darn Frontline show featuring Kiva and the microloans really got to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Radio announcer for a country music station in the Milwaukee, Wisconsin, area.

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: this is real economic development\\r\\ni studied it in school.  this puts it in practice\\r\\n
lenders.occupational_info: tax accounting for small business owners.  hopefully, those in other parts of the world don't have as many government rules and regulations to follow as we do!

lenders.name: Sana
lenders.loan_because: Because we care.

lenders.name: Nelson Family
lenders.loan_because: we believe in the power of micro finance to change lives.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a portion of every dollar earned should go toward giving.

lenders.name: Edgar
lenders.loan_because: I\'ve been on the other side and know  that even the smallest contribution (economic or otherwise), at the right time, can mean the difference between eating dinner...or eating your nails.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business-people understand the causes of a problem and help them make more informed decisions to reduce risk and improve their chances of success.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is good for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: My kids say I help catch the bad guys.

lenders.name: Jay & Doug
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way to spread the true meaning of free enterprise & democracy.  Help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Edward and Catherine
lenders.loan_because: we are so blessed and believe it is our responsibility to  help and support those trying to improve the quality of their lives.

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: When I was a single mom, God put many angels in my life when I needed help most.  I prayed, that when I was able, God would use me as an angel to help others.  I try to never pass up an opportunity to give back what has been given to me.

lenders.name: Jens
lenders.loan_because: Given the opportunity and a fair lending environment people can sustain themselves long term. Kiva provides that and I am honored to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: I make video games. Seriously. :-)

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.occupation: Asst. Prof.  Emily Carr Institute of Art & Design
lenders.loan_because: I teach issues of social justice and equity as part of a course on Global Design.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to do it.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn’t I?

lenders.name: Stewart
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that my donations work multiple times!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I build houses.

lenders.name: Penny & Julian
lenders.loan_because: we are grateful.
lenders.occupational_info: Julian writes computer software for the development of medical equipment and Penny is a Pilates instructor.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: If I was born in a country with few opportunities, or if my children were born there, I would hope that someone would help me / them.
lenders.occupational_info: I program computers

lenders.name: Guillaume
lenders.occupational_info: writing software (free software in particular), taking photos

lenders.name: Daniel Hostetler
lenders.loan_because: I believe in small business with all my heart. I had a business because somebody lent money to me and I am pushing the favor forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small business owners succeed by walking side-by-side with them through the accomplishment of their goals

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel like I am helping someone.  I have been very fortunate and need to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell a line of designer handbags called Beijo.

lenders.name: Shayne
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: I work in retail in the arts, so I love to support others in creative pursuits!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple, good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade.

lenders.name: Hadley
lenders.loan_because: I am able. I am so greatful for everyone in my life that has helped me get amazing opportunities and am thankful to be able to 'pay it forward' in any way possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan celebrations for big groups of people on our yachts on Lake Michigan in Chicago

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: kiva deserves my support
lenders.occupational_info: adviser for modern art

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I want to help motivated people to improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: My company buys telecom equipment for re-usage and sells refurbished parts in Europe.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate student in business

lenders.name: Alfred
lenders.loan_because: it is a joy to help people who try to make their lifes better
lenders.occupational_info: I'm helping refugees who are coming from over the world to my country with their juridical and social problems

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to give
lenders.occupational_info: I establish the value of real estate.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of microcredit and love the opportunity to be able to help other women all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My business, The Modern Goddess is about empowering and inspiring women through personal and spiritual development.  I love helping people grow, develop and move forward in their life.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: more than anything else, I believe in this truth stated by Anthropologist Margaret Mead: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a part-time graduate student studying environmental policy to help make the world a cleaner, healthier, safer place for you and me to live. When I am not at school, I do administrative computer and paperwork for a University office to help pay my bills! :)

lenders.name: Sarkozy-Banoczy Family
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop institutions and programs for Native people in support of small business, homeownership and other asset building activities.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: Those who have have begun a small business have already invested. They have demonstrated their ability to imagine(and work for), a better future. These are people motivated to make the most of an opportunity. They are already leaders, and encourage others. They will compound an investment and invest in someone else, because business works best when it works for everyone...
lenders.occupational_info: I cover the glass of a picture frame with fabric, and pin just the right piece of jewelry on it, so it can be enjoyed when it is not being worn.

lenders.name: Linda and Greg
lenders.loan_because: It is important to invest in people. Being able to help is a blessing. It is also in memory of my beloved Oma.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: even a little bit can make a difference around the world.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to be given opportunities to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Very busy mom who takes care of 3 children - 2 of them are small; the other is in high school.

lenders.name: Michelle Kreger
lenders.loan_because: Its so amazing to be able to connect to an entrepreneur on the other side of the world with just a few clicks.  I love the stories, and I love being able to do my part to make the world a little flatter.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an incredible team of people to grow our MFI partner base and get organizations across the globe excited to partner with Kiva.  I love my job because each day I get to innovate and grow alongside my colleagues to make Kiva a better experience for our partners, our lenders and the entrepreneurs we serve.

lenders.name: Laetitia and Martijn
lenders.loan_because: we need a better world

lenders.name: ralf
lenders.loan_because: i borrow

lenders.name: Alexandre
lenders.loan_because: i loan because I am fortunate enough to be able to...it is the least I can do...and I hope that it will encourage others to make efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I build foundations for all types of industrial building projects.\\r\\n

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: To put in my grain of sand and help improve someone else's life

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: it means a new impulse to small businesses and therefore to communities and people's lives. Moreover, one can fairly easily contribute to someone's success and help make a way of life sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info:
1) Optimization of organization's processes in the services industry
2) Building businesses from Concept Phase,  through Business Case to Opening Party

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple way to help create value for other parts of the world that can use help in making a better life for everyone. I also feel that it is a much better model than charity, as people develop, rather than surrender their dignity as they get the help they need to improve their lives. Then again, a number of people have invested in me over the years...it's a good habit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies use technology to build better solutions for, and relationships with, customers.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with many good things in life and I want to give back, especially to people who are trying to make a better life for themselves.  Also, my wife and I were business owners when we were younger.  I know the difficulties we faced when looking for money to start and run our business.  I want to help out anyway I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I\\\'m a news reporter for a radio station in Cincinnati, Ohio.  I do local newscasts during our morning news show.  I get up at about 3:30 in the morning so I can be to work by about 4:30.  Once I\\\'m finished with my newscasts, I spend the rest of my day interviewing people from government officials to community leaders and business officials so I can write news stories that run on the station. I\\\'ve been doing this kind of work for more than 20 years.  I went to college at the University of Dayton and studied radio/television broadcasting.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: This is what we feel we are supposed to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineering

lenders.name: Garrett
lenders.loan_because: This is a really cool concept and it is nice to know that all my money is going to those individuals who actually need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying Business, so microfinance is fascinating to me.

lenders.name: BEEZY
lenders.loan_because: i feel that people need oppurtunities to fulfill there goals. Everyone needs a chance. We need to put more faith in PEOPLE!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a rapper / producer!!! www.coldwarrecords.com / www.myspace.com/352beez

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for 30 years and very fortunate to have success - It is great to help others get a foundation of independence through a business they own and control. Kiva is a great way to do it because you are connecting with the folks in need in the most direct fashion.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business person and an engineer (computer software and hardware) - have been doing it for 30 years - I love to start small businesses and help others grow their businesses.

lenders.name: Eduardo
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that we can help each other in this world. In addition, I want to see other succed!

lenders.name: B Family
lenders.loan_because: we realize everyone needs help at some time or another, including us. At this time we are fortunate enough that we can be the ones helping.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: money is like manure - it doesn't do anything unless you spread it around making small things grow.

lenders.name: Judy

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from being a writing teacher.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping individuals working to improve their - and other people's - lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student in Seattle, USA, studying geography.

lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my day raising my three kids.  In my bits of spare time, I love to design and sew clothing.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a great Christian college, studying things and figuring out how to live a life of reckless love

lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy and I help people who already own a home to sell it.

lenders.occupational_info: Computer guy, also involved with Audubon Society

lenders.occupational_info: Consultant for technical and organizational problems. Nowadays I am also photographer; see my website.  My wife is a professional piano-player.

lenders.name: Paul

It feels good to be part of other people's life in a positive way.

lenders.name: Christopher Harris

lenders.occupational_info: I work with teenagers in an Upward Bound Program. It exists to help kids who wish to be the first in their family to attend college.

lenders.name: God's Glory
lenders.loan_because:
Romans 11:36a — “For from him and through him and to him are all things ...” 

Luke 12:15-17a, 19b-21, 33 — “Then he said to them, ‘Watch out! Be on your guard against all kinds of greed; a man’s life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions.’ And he told them this parable: ‘The ground of a certain rich man produced a good crop. He thought to himself, ... “[I] have plenty of good things laid up for many years. Take life easy; eat, drink and be merry.” But God said to him, “You fool! This very night your life will be demanded from you.” This is how it will be with anyone who stores up things for himself but is not rich toward God. ... Sell your possessions and give to the poor. Provide purses for yourselves that will not wear out, a treasure in heaven that will not be exhausted, where no thief comes near and no moth destroys. ...’ ” 

 Luke 3:8a, 10-11 — “ ‘Produce fruit in keeping with repentance ...’ ... ‘What should we do then?’ the crowd asked. John answered, ‘The man with two tunics should share with him who has none, and the one who has food should do the same.’ ” 

John 3:16 — “For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.”

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: God and so many have invested in me.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide computer support for professors at Stanford University.

lenders.name: Betsy

lenders.name: thomas and liz

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are struggling to find meaning in their life, deal with loss and pain, and grow in healthy ways.

lenders.name: julio

lenders.occupational_info: I work to match local students and young adults find and keep work.

lenders.name: Alen

lenders.occupational_info: I protect computers against hackers.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to use technology to improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I link computers together in networks to improve information sharing for businesses and government.

lenders.name: Valentin

We are so detached from the rest of the world, we often don\'t realize that people in other parts of the world have far less and have to deal with problems we can\'t even imagine.  The U.S. government and the people of the U.S. need to do more to share the wealth.  Kiva.org is a wonderful start.

lenders.loan_because: to make sure people in need get money and I think it is great
lenders.occupational_info: I am in 7th grade I really like to go fishing and play with my friends  i also love break dancing and playing guitar

I also purhcase property, renovate it and flip it to make a profit.

I'm born and living in the more fortunate part of the world and very happy to find such a direct way to contribute to people who have the drive to stand up and change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I choose to be a tailor because the diversity of possibilities within the profession and because it gives me the possibility to earn a living anywhere in the world. and so I did. from independent designer/tailor in a small street in Amsterdam to productionmanager in china to creative patternmaker at Levis and everything inbetween.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: The money I\'m loaning will go further this way than if I spend it on something for myself, and knowing that it can effect someone\'s life is powerful. lenders.name: Beth

lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer that works very hard to support his family.

I help my husband advance in his career.  I give our children love, education and safety.  I keep our finances balanced.  When I can, I put my inside vision onto a canvas with paint.

lenders.name: Floris
lenders.loan_because: it is my moral responsibility to assist people around the world to make their dreams come true, and have a better life. Unfortunately I stopped loaning via Kiva after 6.5 years, and am withdrawing my funds, when in 2013 it decided to partner with Strathmore University in Kenya. This is a corporate undertaking of Opus Dei. And Opus Dei is known for its conservative views on women and gay rights. Even after many complaints from its LGBT team Kiva refuses to terminate this partnership, which I find fundamentally wrong. Please consider loaning via http://www.lendwithcare.org/groups/profile/glbt instead.

lenders.name: Ria
lenders.loan_because: It is important that other people get a change for a better live and to develope themselves and their famely.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small toeristical business. And I am mother of 5 children and 8 grand children.

lenders.name: Sven Ternov
lenders.loan_because: I find the KIVA concept a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
Human factors specialist in air traffic navigation..
PhD student Lund Institute of Technology.
Student of history at Lund University.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: even the most promising business idea/plan will fail if you do not have access to necessary funds to get it started. and could there be any better than to directly support entrepreneurs in ameliorating their families future prospects far away from our secure homes and lifes?
lenders.occupational_info: owning and running a restaurant

lenders.name: Maud
lenders.loan_because: You'll never know when you will need help - so I am grateful I am able to lean and do not need to borrow...

lenders.name: amedeo
lenders.loan_because: I want to be of help. I believe kiwa to be a clever way to improve the life of  people and to make the world a better place
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer and I specialize in digital prints for advertisment and expositions

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and Kiva makes it easy.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping other people. It is truly rewarding to do this. I believe that if you can give a little , your heart and soul will be rewarded 100 times over!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom who tries to help in my community and I am so glad I found this site.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to see dreams and small businesses thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I embroider and work with computers to create educational materials for machine embroiderers.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.  I help people get on the internet, use email and do business with their computers.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: as a group of high school students, we want to help people trying to improve the lives of themselves and others in their community

lenders.name: Maxine
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wonderful Mother and Aunt.  Who Listens well,gives advise and cares about others and their lives. I love life and look forward to its challenges and rewards.

lenders.name: Dancers Hearth
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in individual lives.  We loan because Kiva is a great idea.  We loan because Kiva has made it possible.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of like minded friends who hold the earth and her inhabitants sacred.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I want to serve the greater-good.

lenders.name: Aleksandr
lenders.loan_because: A first-generation immigrant from Eastern Europe, I know the difference that a few dollars could make. I am grateful for an opportunity to make this difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals and organizations reach their highest potential. In the process, I grow by learning from them.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Even the curmudgeonly should recognize common sense. If you have not lent yet, take the plunge.
lenders.occupational_info: Online adversting

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky to get a loan or two from time to time, and I'm lucky to be able to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I've got some TV gear and I've figured out a way to get jobs helping people make television commercials, programs, and behind the scenes stuff on feature films.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving others a hand up and I want to teach my grandchildren to do the same
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired child/Family therapist/counselor. I helped children and families solve their problems and live happier lives for 15 years and more.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Give a someone a fish and you feed him or her for a day. Teach a person to fish and you feed her or him for a lifetime.

lenders.name: Sunny & Luna
lenders.loan_because: work makes you happy and happy people are good company

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to a fellow entreprenuer.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales.

lenders.name: Rajesh Ullatil
lenders.loan_because: I really appreciate hard working people. From Kiva I came to know that many such hardworking people around world need financial assistance. If I can make a difference in their life with my small loan, I will be more than happy!
lenders.occupational_info: I write software code for a major bank.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel great to know that I\\\'m helping someone that is in need. People need help, and I\'m going to do something about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 18 years old and I am a Massage Therapist. I help promote good health and I love doing it. I also volunteer my services to schools, churches,charities, fund raisers ect...

lenders.name: Steuart
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping people help themselves will pay dividends to the entire world.

lenders.name: Winn
lenders.loan_because: I should do my best to help those who try to help themself.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to pursue a happier life as them. So I should give them a hand and learn from them. Then I would share the piece of happiness and joy.

lenders.name: Joe and Kim
lenders.loan_because: I love the innovative spirit of the people applying for the loans
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the medical imaging department of a local hospital

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It is a great business lesson I can share with my boys while helping the world become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I supply data to companies trying to locate new customers. I live in Colorado and enjoy it very much.
